packeg
1).json----->directory------>(mostt revel product name,imge,price)
|
|
|
2)html file------>empty div----->styling------->dynamic section that will show the serch itme ans this items will bee sent by js

3)js---->.josn---->data fetch---->input(search)== compare---->result----->js---->card wise show

4)result----->{name:"samsung",model:"xyz",img:'.jpg",description:"gsdhyf"}
|
|
|
|
5)html and css------>html(path) , css(design).
